posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Elegant Ceramic Tile Floors', "-Individual Flat Screen TV's on Cardio Equipment", '-Additional Monthly Parking Available', '-Built-in Microwave', '-Beautiful Los Angeles City Views from Many Vantage Points', '-Enjoy Downtown Los Angeles Fine Dining, Shopping, Museums and More!', '-Deluxe Frost Free Refrigerator', '-Brunswick Virtual Bowling', '-Individual Apartment Balconies or Patios', '-Gorgeous Water Fountains at Every Corner', "-Director's Movie Screening Theater", '-Four Star Trac/Cybex Cycling Machines', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '550 N.
